As the Dean of the College of Computer Studies, I am excited to welcome you to the University of Cebu  and to the field of Computer Science. My commitment is to provide you with the best possible education and to help you succeed in your studies and careers.

Computer science is a rapidly growing and evolving field that offers many opportunities for students. Having a degree in this field provides you with a deep understanding of theories and emerging technologies, allowing you to develop cutting-edge solutions that address today's challenges.

Our college has faculty members who are experts, passionate about teaching and mentoring, and are committed to helping you reach your full potential. We also have facilities and resources that will support your learning.

In addition to your course requirements, I encourage you to get involved in co-curricular and extracurricular activities, such as research, internships, hackathons, and ICT congress. These activities will help you gain real-world experience and develop your skills. These activities can help you stand out in the job market and prepare you for the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead.

I also encourage you to network with alumni and industry professionals. These connections will help you land your dream job after graduation. The good thing is, we already have a lot of industry partners where most of our alumni are working.
I am confident that you will have a successful and rewarding career in computer science. I am here to support you every step of the way.
